topicTitle: WOW, I cant believe this happened.

posts.postText:
So, I leave my gas door open for like 20 minutes so I can run to my locker and grab something...

AND SOME RETARD SHOVED DIRT AND STICKS INTO MY TANK!!!!

Now my car wont run, and is still in a 2 hour parking zone. Already got one ticket.

What should I do?

Gash told me to do this
>>  blank >: No really, find him, and break his legs, steal his wallet, thenfix your car and hang him by his legs off of a bridge, over water and 2 bricks tied to his hands.
I think the real question is why was your gas door open and why didn't you close it.
Why don't you shove sticks and dirt up his Gas Tank if you know what I mean...

>> I think the real question is why was your gas door open and why didn't you close it. 
The switch is next to the trunk and I hit it without noticing when I got my backpack out.

>> >> I think the real question is why was your gas door open and why didn't you close it. 
The switch is next to the trunk and I hit it without noticing when I got my backpack out. 

Uh huh, and it takes 20 mins to go to your locker to grab something?

>> >> >> I think the real question is why was your gas door open and why didn't you close it. 
The switch is next to the trunk and I hit it without noticing when I got my backpack out. 

Uh huh, and it takes 20 mins to go to your locker to grab something? 


Yea, I had to find the janitor to unlock the 4th floor hall.
